SystemPartTypes.Name: MirrorStarDiagonal
SystemPartTypes.Description: Angled mirror or prism accessory that redirects light for more comfortable telescope viewing

SystemPartTypes.Name: BlockingFilterDiagonal
SystemPartTypes.Description: Diagonal with a built-in filter that blocks most of the Sun's light, allowing safe solar viewing

SystemPartTypes.Name: HAlphaEtalon
SystemPartTypes.Description: Narrowband filter that isolates the red light of hydrogen-alpha (H-alpha) for solar viewing

SystemPartTypes.Name: AltAzMount
SystemPartTypes.Description: A two-axis telescope mount that moves in altitude (up/down) and azimuth (left/right) for simple, intuitive tracking

SystemPartTypes.Name: EquatorialMount
SystemPartTypes.Description: A two-axis telescope mount that moves in right ascension (RA) and declination (Dec) for precise tracking of celestial objects

SystemPartTypes.Name: AstroCamera
SystemPartTypes.Description: A specialized digital camera optimized for astronomical imaging, designed for deep-sky, planetary, or solar photography
